Collection Pages Settings

A Collection page is where your products are categorized into a collection. It allows your customers to find what they are searching for quickly. Collections are a group of items - a single product can be featured in multiple collections across your store, and multiple versions of this product are not required.

Collections are not controlled by the theme. They are created either manually or automatically using your Shopify admin panel. Learn more about Collections.

Settings#

1. Title background color#

Customize title background color (white, light, dark, primary, secondary, carbon effect, gradient).

2. Title background gradient#

Paste your CSS gradient code from sources like uiGradients.

3. Show collection image in title#

You can enable/disable image in the title.

4. Show tags in title#

You can enable/disable tags in the title.

5. Title alignment#

You can choose title positioning (left, center, right).

6. Center#

You can enable/disable Collection positioning in the center. If disabled, Collection will stretch to the entire width of the page.
